text: Very thankful to Ann who made the whole process so smooth and efficient for our family in our will making! Kudos! She's obviously the best and nicest as compared to executives from other law firms. High recommend the firm!

We first used Maurice Lee & Tan (ML&T) to certify our application for the Lasting Power of Attorney.

Subsequently we used the services of ML&T to prepare our Wills.

We found the services of ML&T to be very satisfactory. Maurice & Ms Tan were very patient with our questions & queries which enabled us to conclude our LPA & Wills preparation in a short period of time.
J&J

Maurice and Wee Nee have been our familyâ€™s lawyers for last 3 decades, advising on conveyancing to litigation work. Their professionalism and attention to details stands out for a firm of this size. I highly recommend them to small business owners, large corporates and families, all whose needs will be well served by them.

Maurice firm was highly efficient and professional and helped us greatly in handling our late father's affairs. He is reliable and trustworthy and we would have no hesitation to recommend his services to others.

I needed to engage a law firm to advise me on how to ring fence my assets for my legacy planning. This law firm helped me to identify all the pressing issues on a macro level and then zoomed to set up set my Will, Trust and LPA. I chose this law firm after some searches because they don't claim to be jacks of all trades. They are focused on a few practice areas and they did it well. They are easy to contact and responsive to my queries. It has been a pleasant experience. I like their professional approach and methodology in problem solving. They are customer centric. Now that  I have addressed my Will, Trust and LPA, I feel at peace knowing come what may (Covid19 or otherwise), I know that my legacy planning is intact. This law firm is a hidden gem in the East.
